page.title: 12A Day in Mrs Jones' Life
page.content: My mum started Tuesday 11th of June by putting a load of washing in the machine, putting rubbish out for the dustmen and making a shopping list. She runs a{playschool}so she got ready for the children. When all the children had arrived one of her friends came to show them her new baby. At twelve o'clock the children left. She went{shopping}and went to the bank and Sainsbury, and she then left Chippenham. On the way back she had to stop for petrol. When she got home she put the shopping away and read her new book on{microwave cooking. Then she started the diary for me. Dad came in for a cup of tea before taking his Father to the Solicitor. At about 9.00 I went to bed. by Louise Jones
